Class AtomicClock

  • java.lang.Object
    • sample.AtomicClock
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, ObservableTime
    public class AtomicClock
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable, ObservableTime
    Class implemnet interface Runnable and ObserverTime to create a atomic clock.
    Author:
    Weronika Warwas
